text: (Varito ila anu): "Emi? Nenu allah nu vadali vere n'yayadhipatini anvesincala? Mariyu ayane mipai spastamaina granthanni avatarimpajesadu kada?" Mariyu niscayanga, idi (i grantham) ni prabhuvu taraphu nundi satyadharanga avatarimpajeyabadindani purvam grantha mosangabadina prajalaku baga telusu! Kavuna nivu sandehince varilo ceraku
